SCTX - Script Source:
SCN FBMWShrineVivecStopMoon

; Shrine of Daring / Shrine to Stop the Moon
; Applied to the tribunal shrine associated with the quest.
; This script is minimally functional and still mostly in Morrowind Scripting Language.
; It can be reworked when the Dunmer Temple quests are rebuilt.

short questionState
short button

Begin OnActivate

	if ( questionState == 0 )

		if ( Player.GetItemCount 0PULevitationUB > 0 )
			MessageBox "Would you like to donate a potion of rising force and ask for a blessing?" "Yes" "No"
			Set questionState to 1
			Return
		endif

		if ( Player.GetItemCount 0PULevitationUC > 0 )
			MessageBox "Would you like to donate a potion of rising force and ask for a blessing?" "Yes" "No"
			Set questionState to 1
			Return
		endif

		if ( Player.GetItemCount 0PULevitationUS > 0 )
			MessageBox "Would you like to donate a potion of rising force and ask for a blessing?" "Yes" "No"
			Set questionState to 1
			Return
		endif

		if ( Player.GetItemCount 0PULevitationUQ > 0 )
			MessageBox "Would you like to donate a potion of rising force and ask for a blessing?" "Yes" "No"
			Set questionState to 1
			Return
		endif

		if ( Player.GetItemCount 0PULevitationUE > 0 )
			MessageBox "Would you like to donate a potion of rising force and ask for a blessing?" "Yes" "No"
			Set questionState to 1
			Return
		endif

		MessageBox "Here Vivec stopped the moon before it crashed into Vivec City. The moon levitates now above the city and is known as the Ministry of Truth."
		Set questionState to 0
		Return

	endif

End

Begin GameMode

	if ( questionState == 1 )

		Set button to GetButtonPressed

		if ( button == 1 )
			Set questionState to 0
			Return
		endif

		if ( button == 0 )
			if ( Player.GetItemCount 0PULevitationUB > 0 )
				Player.RemoveItem 0PULevitationUB 1
				Set questionState to 2
				Return
			endif

			if ( Player.GetItemCount 0PULevitationUC > 0 )
				Player.RemoveItem 0PULevitationUC 1
				Set questionState to 2
				Return
			endif

			if ( Player.GetItemCount 0PULevitationUS > 0 )
				Player.RemoveItem 0PULevitationUS 1
				Set questionState to 2
				Return
			endif	

			if ( Player.GetItemCount 0PULevitationUQ > 0 )
				Player.RemoveItem 0PULevitationUQ 1
				Set questionState to 2
				Return
			endif

			if ( Player.GetItemCount 0PULevitationUE > 0 )
				Player.RemoveItem 0PULevitationUE 1
				Set questionState to 2
				Return
			endif
		endif
	endif

	if ( questionState == 2 )
		printc "debug: Casting fbmwLevitate1440Spell Player..."
		Cast 0shrineUstopmoonUsp Player
		MessageBox "The Grace of Daring: Thank you for your daring, Lord Vivec. I shall not shun risk, nor hide behind the mask of cautious counsel, for fortune favors the bold."
		SetStage fbmwttsevengraces 11
		Set questionState to 0
	endif
	
End

;<CSEBlock>
;<CSECaretPos> 2501 </CSECaretPos>
;</CSEBlock>
